scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.start-all: concurrently "cd client && set VITE_SERVE=3001 VITE_BACKEND_URL=http://localhost:8001 && npm start" "cd server && set PORT=8001 && npm start" "cd client && set VITE_SERVE=3000 VITE_BACKEND_URL=http://localhost:8000 && npm start" "cd server && set PORT=8000 && npm start"
